body:
Basically if the storage gets freed between lines 39 and 41:

[thread-1] get `storage_ref` from _shared_cache
[thread-2] free shared Storage, which sets `storage_ref.cdata` to `None` and may remove it for `_shared_cache`
[thread-1] call  `cls._new_with_weak_ptr(storage_ref)`. This checks `storage_ref.cdata` and returns None if if the field is None
